exceptions.tactic: apply sum_power_binary_lt_inv in H19 as [a [Ha1 Ha2]]; auto.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> exists a : nat -> nat, m = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) /\\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2)" on hypothesis of type "u * u = u1 + u2".
The reference a was not found in the current environment.
The reference Ha1 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros. apply sum_power_binary_lt_inv in H19 as [a [Ha1 Ha2]]; auto. exists a. rewrite Ha1. auto.
